title: Algae Swirls Across a South African Reservoir
description: Vivid green blooms form, drift, and fade in Hartbeespoortdam reservoir over the course of a year.
content: Vivid green blooms form, drift, and fade in Hartbeespoortdam reservoir over the course of a year.
